physical_examinations.vital_signs: CSF protein content elevated to 1.17 g/L.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe global cognitive impairment, down-beating nystagmus, dysarthria, tremor, and increased tone worse on the right.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Condition progressed with development of seizures and cognitive impairment over a 3-year period.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neurologic examination showed mild scanning dysarthria, mild loss of sensation in the feet, moderate dysmetria in the lower extremities, and ataxic gait.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild impairment demonstrated; evolving from stroke-like episodes previously.
